title: Samsung Galaxy Fold review
textBody: Samsung presents a fold smartphone. The device has flexible display and new chip.

title: Apple and Samsung market share
textBody: Apple and Samsung compete in the smartphone market. Galaxy Watch and iPhone are top devices.

title: Google camera update
textBody: Google releases camera update for Android devices, including Samsung phones.

title: Samsung display technology
textBody: New screen by Samsung with AMOLED display and high refresh rate.
